page.title: 07Attitudes, Gipsey Bridge
page.content:
We questionned people in our village about their attitudes to 5 different aspects of modern life.
{Unemployment} most people considered that this was a very serious subject and caused a iot of concern.A few people didnt think it was a very important subject.
{Computers} all of the people decided that computers were very useful and economical.A couple of people said they were not a very good idea.
{Space}most people said that space travel was a good idea some people however do not think that we should be exploring space
